title: Hi, Iâ€™m Shuai Wang ðŸ‘‹
text:
Iâ€™m a Masterâ€™s student studying City Planning and Spatial Analytics at the University of Pennsylvania. Iâ€™m passionate about leveraging the power of data science and technology for sustainable development and business growth. My current research focuses on urban technology, transportation and community development.
Prior to Penn, I worked as a Transport Planning and GIS Intern and gained my Bachelorâ€™s degree in Urban Planning at the University of Liverpool, UK.
I love travelling, and backpacked across 11 countries in Europe as my graduation trip. Seeing first hand how cultures, lifestyles, food and languages spark and interact across different places, Iâ€™m more determined to reveal the hidden dynamics that drive the development behind the development of cities, businesses and human behaviors.
